prompt: Which unit is relative to root font-size?

answer: Box-sizing default; use box-sizing:border-box; or check padding/border

prompt: Which property makes font bold?

prompt: Which pseudo-class applies on hover?

prompt: Which property controls flex direction?

prompt:
Why not center text?
.container { text-align:center } .child { display:block; width:100px; margin:0 }
answer: Child is block; to center block use margin: 0 auto; text-align centers inline content

prompt: Which property defines grid columns?
